A.intro: In the following question please select one answer next to the response that most appeals to you. There are no correct or incorrect answers, you simply indicating your preferences. The mode that you score highest indicates your perceptual preference
A.description: In the list below, highlight one answer next to the response that most appeals to you in A, B or C

options: Listening to the sounds of the ocean is calming
I find watching people enjoyable
Walking barefoot in the sand is terrific
I enjoy looking at illustrations, paintings and picture books
Gut feelings help me sense the answer to test questions
I would rather take an oral test than a written test
People tell me I have a good speaking voice.
I enjoy being touched
When I look good my confidence increases
I seem to want to hold or touch as they are explained
I would rather be shown an illustration than have something explained to me.
When I talk out loud it helps me to undestand things better
I am sensitive to the energy in a home
I enjoy colourful illustrations and unusual artwork
I am a good listener
I would rather listen to CD's or my iPod than read books
I like hiking and other outdoor activities
I like to watch television and go to the movies
A car that feels good when I drive it is terrific
It's important that my car is kept clean inside and out
I notice even the slightest noise that my car makes
When I am conversing with people I tend to touch them
"People watching" is a favorite thing for me
Others tell me that I'm easy to talk to.
I can recognize voices on the phone with ease
I like walking with people I am fond of
I often remember what someone looks like, but not the person's name
Making things with my hands is fun
I often find myself humming or singing to the radio when driving
I enjoy photography
I can always clearly see shapes in the clouds
I enjoy anagrams and crossword puzzles
I like to hold or touch an object as it is being discussed
I prefer to map out directions when I drive
I like to think I am well coordinated
I like to be in quiet surroundings
I exercise because of the way I feel afterward
I am good at finding my way using a map
I can resolve problems more quickly when I talk out loud
I like a house with rooms that allow for quiet areas
I like a house that feels welcoming and comfortable
It's important that my house is clean and tidy
I find being touched very relaxing
I find visual aids make explainations much clearer
I prefer to be asked questions in an exam

B.intro: Read the description for each situation and vividly image it happening to you, even if it has never actually happened. Than read the two reasons why this situation happened. Choose the cause more likely to apply to you. You may not like the way some of the responses sound, but don't choose what you think you should say or what would sound right to other people; chiise the response you'd be likelier to have

questions.question: You and your significant other/best friend find a compromise after a heated argument
options: I forgave him/her
I am usually understanding and forgiving

questions.question: You forgot your inlaws were coming to dinner
options: I was immersed in work and unmindful of the time
I am not good at remembering specific dates

questions.question: You receive an unexpected gift anonymously from someone at work
options: I am well liked and respected
I must have been helpful this week

questions.question: You run from a community office position and you win
options: I devoted a lot of time and energy to campaigning
I work very hard at everything I do

questions.question: You miss an important engagement
options: Sometimes my memory fails me
I sometimes forgot to check my appointment book

questions.question: You host a successful workshop
options: I was on form that day
I am a great host

questions.question: You owe the library ten dollars for an overdue book
options: When I am really involved in what I am reading, I often forget when it's due
I was so involved in writing the report that I forgot to return the book

questions.question: Your stocks make you a lot of money
options: My broker is top-notch investor
My broker decided to take a chance on something new

questions.question: You win an athletic contest
options: I was feeling unbeatable
I train hard

questions.question: You fail an important examination
options: I wasn't as smart as the other people taking the exam
I didn't prepare for it well

questions.question: You prepared a vegetarian meal for a vegan friend and she/he just picked at it
options: It wasn't a good result
I made it in a hurry

questions.question: You lose a sporting event for which you have been training for a long time
options: I'm not good at the sport
I'm not very athletic

questions.question: You lose your temper with a friend
options: He/she was in a hostile mood
He/she is always nagging me

questions.question: You are fined for parking on a yellow line
options: I was lazy about checking where to park
I always miss seeing the signs

questions.question: You ask a person out on a date and he/she says no
options: I was a wreck that day
I got tongue tied when I asked him/her on the date

questions.question: You are frequently asked to dance at a party
options: I am outgoing at parties
I was in perfect form that night

questions.question: You do exceptionally well in a job interview
options: I interviewed well
I felt extremely confident during the interview

questions.question: Your boss gives you too little time in which to finish a project, but you get it finished anyway
options: I am good at my job
I am an efficient person

questions.question: You've been feeling run down lately
options: I never get a chance to relax
I was exceptionally busy this week

questions.question: You save a person from choking to death
options: I know a technique to stop someone from choking
I know what to do in crisis situations

questions.question: Your romantic partner wants to cool things off for a while
options: I don't spend enough time with him/her
I'm too self centered

questions.question: A friend says something that hurts your feelings
options: My friend was in a bad mood and took it out on me
She always blurts things out without thinking of others

questions.question: A senior colleague comes to you fro advice
options: I am good at giving useful advice
I am an expert in the area about which I was asked

questions.question: A friend thanks you for helping him/her get through a bad time
options: I knew about the subject matter
I am good at giving beneficial advice

questions.question: Your doctor tells you that you are in good physical shape
options: I make sure I exercice frequently
I am very health conscious

questions.question: Your partner (boyfriend/girlfriend) takes you away for a romantic weekend
options: He/she needed to get away for a few days
He/She likes to explore new areas

questions.question: You are asked to head an important project
options: I am a good supervisor
I just successfully completed a similar project

questions.question: You fall down a great deal while skiing
options: Skiing is difficult
The trails were icy

questions.question: You win a prestigious award
options: I solved an important problem
I was the best employee

questions.question: Your stocks are at an all time low
options: I made a poor choice of stocks
I didn't know much about the busincess climate at the time

questions.question: You gain weight over the holiday and you can't lose it
options: Diets don't work in the long run
The diet I tried didn't work

questions.question: They won't honor your credit card at a store
options: I sometimes overestimate how much money I have
I sometimes forget to pay my credit card bill

C.intro: For each of the following statements, please place a number either 1, 2, 3, or 4 next to every phrase, where 4 is most like you, 1 is least like you

questions.question: I make important decisions based on: ( 4 if most like you, 1 is least like you )
options: What looks best to me
Gut level feelings
Precise review and study of the issues
Which way sounds the best

questions.question: During an argument, I am most likely to be influenced by: ( 4 if most like you, 1 is least like you)
options: Whether or not I am in touch with the other person's true feelings
The logic of the other person's argument
The other person's tone of voice
Whether or not I can see the other person's point of view

questions.question: I most easily communicate what is going on with me by: ( 4 if most like you , 1 is least like you )
options: How I dress and look
How I feel and what I share
I can convey much with the tone of my voice
The words or expressions I choose

questions.question: It is easiest for me to: ( 4 if most like you , 1 is least like you )
options: Discover the most academically pertinent point in a stimulating discussion
Listen to my favourite radio station at the volume I like
Find the most eye-catching and colourful designs
Choose the most comfortable armchair to sink into

questions.question: This phrase describes me
options: I am in sync with the sounds in my environment
I am skilled at gathering intelligence from statistics and information
I am extremely receptive to colours and how they can brighten a room
I am very perceptive to how silk feels against my skin

D.intro: Almost complete! Answer the following questions selecting one answer for each

questions.question: When you are making a big decision, eg. like buying a house or car, how do you do it? ( Would yoou visit an Excibition Village or a Car Showroom? i.e. Big Picture or would you explore the web or visit an Architect i.e. Small picture

How do you know when you have done a good job? Do you get a gut feeling and know instictively ie. Internally Referenced or do you look for outside feedback and recognition from others ie. Externally Referenced
Were you involved in earning an income or working in a business prior to the age of 12?
Does your partner support you 100% in your business?
